snippet.title: The Temple of Children (Short trailer 2023, Indie horror game)
snippet.description:
The Temple of Children is a story-driven horror adventure about a simple little girl from a Russian province. Against her will she became part of horrible events, watching her reality turn into hell. To survive she needs to unravel the secret that children are hiding.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2856440
VK: https://vk.com/hramdetey_game
TG: https://t.me/hramdetey

Genre: horror, adventure
Platforms: iOS, Android, PC
Release date: Unknown
Sound and music: Alexander Sazykin (tg: almost_done92)
